titleStmt.title: An Act for settling the subsidy of poundage, and granting a subsidy of tunnage And other sums of money, unto His royal Majesty, his heirs and successors: the same to be paid upon merchandizes imported and exported into or out of the kingdom of Ireland, according to a book of rates hereunto annexed.
Public General Acts. 1662-1663. 14 & 15 Cha.II.c.9
titleStmt.author: Ireland.

titleStmt.title: An Act for settling the subsidy of poundage, and granting a subsidy of tunnage And other sums of money, unto His royal Majesty, his heirs and successors: the same to be paid upon merchandizes imported and exported into or out of the kingdom of Ireland, according to a book of rates hereunto annexed.
Public General Acts. 1662-1663. 14 & 15 Cha.II.c.9
titleStmt.author: Ireland.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Benjamin Tooke, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty, for Samuel Dancer bookseller in Castle-street,

notesStmt.note: "The rates of merchandizes:" has caption title with separate pagination and register.
"Certain rules, order, and directions for the advancement of trade," has caption title, is unpaginated and begins new register with quire *.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1475-1640", reel 2406, bound and filmed with Wing I322C.
